channel.title: non-electric on Earthcycles Brisbane
channel.description: Recent content in non-electric on Earthcycles Brisbane

item.title: Kombi
item.description: It’s the bike for everyone – an affordable combination of Yuba’s best bikes! Meet the ultimate urban people mover – from grocery-getting to dominating the school drop off, the Kombi is the right tool for any job.

item.title: Yuba Mundo LUX (V5) Gold
item.description: The Minivan of Cargo Bikes The Mundo LUX is our super sturdy minivan on two wheels. Frame and fork are forged from chromoly steel, which keeps the bike solid as ever but shaves off five pounds from the finished weight.

item.title: Supermarché
item.description: This is Yuba’s first Front Loader Cargo Bike and they’ve held nothing back! Constructed from lightweight aluminium, the Supermarché steers nimbly with a double redundant cable system.

item.title: Sweet Curry
item.description: The Sweet Curry is a pedal powered version of its electrified brother the Spicy Curry. Sure to be an instant crowd favorite, the Sweet Curry boasts a super strong but light aluminium frame of oversized tubing, 20” rear wheel and extra long rear deck for maximum hauling capacity, ready to haul up to 130kg.

item.title: Yuba Mundo LUX (V5) Olive
item.description: The Minivan of Cargo Bikes The Mundo LUX is our super sturdy minivan on two wheels. Frame and fork are forged from chromoly steel, which keeps the bike solid as ever but shaves off five pounds from the finished weight.

item.title: Supermarché With Box
item.description: This is Yuba’s first Front Loader Cargo Bike and they’ve held nothing back! Constructed from lightweight aluminium, the Supermarché steers nimbly with a double redundant cable system.
